title: Bitcoin wastes energy
myth: Bitcoin mining consumes as much energy as a medium‑sized country.
rebuttalPro: Bitcoin’s annual draw is ~0.18 % of global electricity and over 59 % already comes from renewables…
rebuttalELI5: Big computers need power, but they secure digital gold. It’s like using some fuel to guard all the world’s treasure.

title: Only criminals use Bitcoin
rebuttalPro: Chainalysis shows illicit flow was just 0.14 % of volume in 2024 — far below cash’s 2‑5 %…
rebuttalELI5: Bad guys do use BTC, but they mostly stick to cash because it’s easier to hide.
